data.name: Small Town Terrors: Galdor's Bluff Collector's Edition
data.detailed_description:
You've been cordially invited to attend the performance of Thurman the Magnificent, one of the world's greatest illusionists. His entire career rests on the success of this trick, and Thurman is worried someone may be sabotaging it. He wants you to watch for anyone suspicious at the premiere. Will his performance bring down the house, or will his toughest rival top his act with something even more spectacular? The Master of Flames will soon learn that when you play with fire, you get burned.

A magical tale of deception and illusion awaits as you investigate and look for answers.

  • Over 50 morphing items to find
  • Discover secret clues and solve magical puzzles
  • Backstory of Addington and Thurman in the bonus chapter
  • Wallpapers, concept art and achievements
  • Option to skip hidden object scenes and play pyramid solitaire instead
  • Six bonus solitaire games

data.short_description: A magical tale of deception and illusion awaits as you investigate the rivalry between The Magnificent Thurman and his bitter rival, Roger Addington.
data.supported_languages:
French, German, Dutch, Russian, Czech, Polish, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP, Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Processor or faster
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® compatible video card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card
